price: (24) [Allāh will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
